author: g1.eth
content:
Hi Team,

I've recently developed an interest in Ethereum's core framework and want to dive deep into its codebase to understand its architecture comprehensively from the core level than the application level. I want to become a contributor to eth, Iâ€™d love your guidance on the best way to approach it for a head start. Thanks for any help that will be provided

Looking forward to your insights!
